event_text: The apprentices of the Clan are taking special training to learn how to survive in underground tunnels long-term, in the case of a siege conducted by o_c_n.

As the wind howls on the plains outside, m_c is tucked up in the healers' den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight/m_c. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.

The things {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw today, omen_list_sight/m_c... m_c isolates {PRONOUN/m_c/self} in the shifting long grass, considering what the omens foretell.
The acc_plural are just absolutely blooming this season! m_c decides to keep some to remind {PRONOUN/m_c/object} of such a beautiful sight.
m_c tripped and ended up with acc_plural all over {PRONOUN/m_c/object}! Oh hey, it actually doesn't look that bad...
